constituent: nifty, ice, wife, ten, needle, rake, woman
koohiiStory1: His wife has a nifty way of making all types of ice cream in her home freezer.
kunYomi: さむ.い、すご.い、すさ.まじい
words: terrible, dreadful, terrific, amazing, great, wonderful, to a great extent
earth-shattering, staggering, to a very great extent
